pageContext.geocode_address: 5715 Trailside Dr, Park City, UT 84098, USA
pageContext.public_note: Class takes place in "The Park Building" at Trailside Park - across the street from Trailside Elementary. There are two buildings- The Snyderville Basin Dist. Rec building and a smaller building next to it. LEGO class is in the smaller building.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Level up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Gondolas, Merry-Go-Rounds, and Scissor Lifts. Design and build as never before and explore your craziest ideas.
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge with LEGO® Materials, Spring
